required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Drug-drug Interaction Study of Oral 1250 mg of Vatalinib Administered Under Fasting and Fed Conditions With a Proton-pump Inhibitor in Healthy Sterile or Postmenopausal Female Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase IB, Open Label, Single Center, Drug-drug Interaction Study of Oral 1250 mg of PTK787/ZK 222584 Administered Under Fasting and Fed Conditions With a Proton-pump Inhibitor (Omeprazole) in Healthy Sterile or Postmenopausal Female Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: This study will determine the effect of acidic drugs such as proton-pump inhibitors on the pharmacokinetics of Vatalinib under fasting and fed conditions.

primary_outcome.measure: Assess the effect of multiple doses of a proton-pump inhibitor on the pharmacokinetics of a single dose of Vatalinib under fasting and fed conditions.

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety of a single dose of Vatalinib before and after a proton-pump inhibitor under fasting and fed conditions as assessed by adverse events, laboratory values, electrocardiograms, and vital signs.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria
- Healthy female
- Surgically sterile or post-menopausal
- At least a weight of 50 kg and have a body mass index (BMI) â‰¤33.0
- Non-smokers or those who smoke 25 cigarettes or less per day Exclusion criteria
- Use of certain prescription and over the counter drugs
- Having received an investigational drug within 30 days prior to dosing
- Donation of plasma or donation or loss of whole blood prior to administration of the study medication
- Any clinically significant laboratory tests
- Abnormal cardiac function
- A positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B or C
- A positive alcohol test or drug test
- Known allergy to Vatalinib or Omeprazole
- Any surgical or medical condition which might significantly alter the absorption, distribution, metabolism and excretion or drugs.
Other protocol-defined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply

clinical_study.keyword: Vascular endothelial growth factor receptor (VEGF-R) tyrosine kinase inhibitor
